sentences.source: How razorback-jumping frogs can level six piqued gymnasts
sentences.translation: 跳跃的剃刀蛙如何能击败六位恼怒的体操运动员

sentences.source: The five boxing wizards jump quickly
sentences.translation: 五个拳击巫师快速跳跃

sentences.source: Jinxed wizards pluck ivy from the big quilt
sentences.translation: 被诅咒的巫师从大被子上摘下常春藤

sentences.source: Sphinx of black quartz, judge my vow
sentences.translation: 黑石英的狮身人面像，评判我的誓言

sentences.source: Bright vixens jump; dozy fowl quack
sentences.translation: 明亮的雌狐跳跃；昏昏欲睡的家禽嘎嘎叫

sentences.source: Quick zephyrs blow, vexing daft Jim
sentences.translation: 快速的西风吹拂，困扰着愚蠢的吉姆

sentences.source: Waltz, bad nymph, for quick jigs vex
sentences.translation: 华尔兹，坏仙女，因为快速的吉格舞令人烦恼

sentences.source: Glib jocks quiz nymph to vex dwarf
sentences.translation: 油嘴滑舌的运动员考问仙女以困扰矮人

sentences.source: Jackdaws love my big sphinx of quartz
sentences.translation: 寒鸦喜欢我的大石英狮身人面像

sentences.source: The jay, pig, fox, zebra and my wolves quack
sentences.translation: 松鸦、猪、狐狸、斑马和我的狼嘎嘎叫
同情会解决贵格会教徒的目标

sentences.source: A wizard's job is to vex chumps quickly in fog
sentences.translation: 巫师的工作是在雾中快速困扰笨蛋

sentences.source: Watch 'Jeopardy!', Alex Trebek's fun TV quiz game
sentences.translation: 观看《危险边缘》，亚历克斯·特里贝克的趣味电视问答节目
